amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to prohibit funds from being used to limit the functions of the Department of Education Office for Civil Rights.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to prohibit funds from being used to limit the functions of the Department of Education Office for Civil Rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jeffries amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 275 - 148 (Roll no. 295).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Jeffries.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
